targets.queryText: SELECT description FROM devices WHERE id = $device_id
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT description FROM devices WHERE id = $device_id

targets.queryText:
SELECT strftime('%d/%m/%Y %H:%M', MAX(sensor_data.ts), 'unixepoch') AS updated_at
FROM sensor_data WHERE device = $device_id
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT strftime('%d/%m/%Y %H:%M', MAX(sensor_data.ts), 'unixepoch') AS updated_at
FROM sensor_data WHERE device = $device_id

targets.queryText:
SELECT
  devices.id,
  devices.description, 
  GROUP_CONCAT(CASE WHEN sensor_data.type = 'temperature' THEN sensor_data.value ELSE NULL END) AS temp,
  GROUP_CONCAT(CASE WHEN sensor_data.type = 'pressure' THEN sensor_data.value ELSE NULL END) AS pressure,
  -- GROUP_CONCAT(CASE WHEN sensor_data.type = 'dew' THEN sensor_data.value ELSE NULL END) AS dew,
  -- GROUP_CONCAT(CASE WHEN sensor_data.type = 'gps' THEN sensor_data.value ELSE NULL END) AS gps,
  -- GROUP_CONCAT(CASE WHEN sensor_data.type = 'baro' THEN sensor_data.value ELSE NULL END) AS baro,
  GROUP_CONCAT(CASE WHEN sensor_data.type = 'humidity' THEN sensor_data.value ELSE NULL END) AS humidity
  -- GROUP_CONCAT(CASE WHEN sensor_data.type = 'heat' THEN sensor_data.value ELSE NULL END) AS heat
FROM devices 
JOIN sensor_data ON devices.id = sensor_data.device 
WHERE sensor_data.ts = (SELECT MAX(ts) FROM sensor_data s WHERE s.device = sensor_data.device AND s.type = sensor_data.type)
GROUP BY devices.device;
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT
  devices.id,
  devices.description, 
  GROUP_CONCAT(CASE WHEN sensor_data.type = 'temperature' THEN sensor_data.value ELSE NULL END) AS temp,
  GROUP_CONCAT(CASE WHEN sensor_data.type = 'pressure' THEN sensor_data.value ELSE NULL END) AS pressure,
  -- GROUP_CONCAT(CASE WHEN sensor_data.type = 'dew' THEN sensor_data.value ELSE NULL END) AS dew,
  -- GROUP_CONCAT(CASE WHEN sensor_data.type = 'gps' THEN sensor_data.value ELSE NULL END) AS gps,
  -- GROUP_CONCAT(CASE WHEN sensor_data.type = 'baro' THEN sensor_data.value ELSE NULL END) AS baro,
  GROUP_CONCAT(CASE WHEN sensor_data.type = 'humidity' THEN sensor_data.value ELSE NULL END) AS humidity
  -- GROUP_CONCAT(CASE WHEN sensor_data.type = 'heat' THEN sensor_data.value ELSE NULL END) AS heat
FROM devices 
JOIN sensor_data ON devices.id = sensor_data.device 
WHERE sensor_data.ts = (SELECT MAX(ts) FROM sensor_data s WHERE s.device = sensor_data.device AND s.type = sensor_data.type)
GROUP BY devices.device;

targets.queryText:
SELECT `value`
FROM sensor_data
WHERE device = $device_id AND type = 'temperature' ORDER BY ts DESC
LIMIT 1
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT `value`
FROM sensor_data
WHERE device = $device_id AND type = 'temperature' ORDER BY ts DESC
LIMIT 1

targets.queryText:
SELECT `value`
FROM sensor_data
WHERE device = $device_id AND type = 'gps' ORDER BY ts DESC
LIMIT 1
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT `value`
FROM sensor_data
WHERE device = $device_id AND type = 'gps' ORDER BY ts DESC
LIMIT 1

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN 
        (
            -- timestamp of bigest value
            SELECT MAX(ts) FROM
            (
                SELECT `value`, ts
                FROM sensor_data 
                WHERE 
                    device = $device_id 
                    AND type = 'temperature'
                    AND ts BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__from:to:seconds}
                ORDER BY `value` DESC
                LIMIT 1
            )
        ) > 
        (
        SELECT MIN(ts) FROM
            (
                -- timestamp of lowest value
                SELECT `value`, ts
                FROM sensor_data 
                WHERE 
                    device = $device_id 
                    AND type = 'temperature'
                    AND ts BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__from:to:seconds}
                ORDER BY `value` ASC
                LIMIT 1
            )
        )
        -- either value increased or decreased during this interval FOR LOWEST AND GREATES VALUES ONLY
        -- not first and last ones
        THEN 1
        ELSE -1
    END * ABS(MAX(`value`) - MIN(`value`)) AS result
FROM sensor_data
WHERE device = $device_id AND type = 'temperature' AND ts BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__from:to:seconds}

        ) > 
        (

            (

    END * ABS(MAX(`value`) - MIN(`value`)) AS result

targets.queryText:
SELECT ts, `value` FROM sensor_data
WHERE device = $device_id AND type = 'temperature' AND ts >= ${__to:date:seconds} - ${__from:date:seconds}

WHERE device = $device_id AND type = 'temperature' AND ts >= ${__to:date:seconds} - ${__from:date:seconds}
